name: Multi-Scale Modeling and Simulation in Fluid Mechanics
title: MEAS MECH_ENG 418-0-20 Multi-Scale Modeling and Simulation in Fluid Mechanics

instructors.instructor_addr: Technological Institute, Rm A133, 2145 Sheridan Rd, EV CAMPUS

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value:
Course Objectives:

1) Learn theory and fundamental principles of molecular simulation techniques nanomechanics and biomechanics.
2) Apply molecular simulation tools to explain nano-scale solid and fluid mechanics phenomena with relevance to biological, bioinspired and organic materials.
3) Learn multi-scale simulation frameworks for investigating hierarchical systems.
4) Applications
a. Biological and bioinspired materials: Biopolymer, Protein, DNA, Lipids
b. Solid-fluid interactions and nanoscale flow

subject: MECH_ENG
